00277 
00279 void CnipolAlphaHists::FillPassOne(ChannelEvent *ch)
00280 {
00281    UChar_t      chId = ch->GetChannelId();
00282    const ChannelData &data = ch->GetChannelData();
00283 
00284    string sSi("  ");
00285    sprintf(&sSi[0], "%02d", chId);
00286 
00287    ((TH1F*) o["hAmpltd"])->Fill(data.fAmpltd);
00288    ((TH1F*) o["hIntgrl"])->Fill(data.fIntgrl);
00289    ((TH1F*) o["hTdc"])   ->Fill(data.fTdc);
00290    ((TH2F*) o["hTvsA"])  ->Fill(data.fAmpltd, data.fTdc);
00291    ((TH2F*) o["hTvsI"])  ->Fill(data.fIntgrl, data.fTdc);
00292    ((TH2F*) o["hIvsA"])  ->Fill(data.fAmpltd, data.fIntgrl);
00293 
00294    DrawObjContainer *sd = d["channel" + sSi];
00295 
00296    ((TH1F*) sd->o["hAmpltd_ch"    + sSi])->Fill(data.fAmpltd);
00297    ((TH1F*) sd->o["hIntgrl_ch"    + sSi])->Fill(data.fIntgrl);
00298    ((TH1F*) sd->o["hTdc_ch"       + sSi])->Fill(data.fTdc);
00299    ((TH2F*) sd->o["hTvsA_ch"      + sSi])->Fill(data.fAmpltd, data.fTdc);
00300    ((TH2F*) sd->o["hTvsA_zoom_ch" + sSi])->Fill(data.fAmpltd, data.fTdc);
00301    ((TH2F*) sd->o["hTvsI_ch"      + sSi])->Fill(data.fIntgrl, data.fTdc);
00302    ((TH2F*) sd->o["hIvsA_ch"      + sSi])->Fill(data.fAmpltd, data.fIntgrl);
00303 }

00311 
00313 void CnipolAlphaHists::PostFillPassOne(DrawObjContainer *oc)
00314 {
00315    Info("PostFillPassOne", "Called");
00316 
00317    // Adjust axis ranges
00318    Int_t    maxBinA = ((TH1F*) o["hAmpltd"])->GetMaximumBin();
00319    Double_t   xminA = ((TH1F*) o["hAmpltd"])->GetXaxis()->GetXmin();
00320    Double_t   xmaxA = ((TH1F*) o["hAmpltd"])->GetXaxis()->GetXmax();
00321 
00322    xminA = maxBinA - 50 < xminA ? xminA : maxBinA - 50;
00323    xmaxA = maxBinA + 50 > xmaxA ? xmaxA : maxBinA + 50;
00324 
00325    ((TH1F*) o["hAmpltd"])->SetAxisRange(xminA, xmaxA);
00326 
00327    Int_t  maxBinI  = ((TH1F*) o["hIntgrl"])->GetMaximumBin();
00328    Double_t xminI  = ((TH1F*) o["hIntgrl"])->GetXaxis()->GetXmin();
00329    Double_t xmaxI  = ((TH1F*) o["hIntgrl"])->GetXaxis()->GetXmax();
00330    //Int_t tmaxBinI  = 0;
00331    Int_t tmaxBinA  = 0;
00332    Double_t valueA = 0;
00333    Int_t maxBinAa  = 0;
00334 
00335    //Int_t maxBin = 0;
00336 
00337    xminI = maxBinI - 50 < xminI ? xminI : maxBinI - 50;
00338    xmaxI = maxBinI + 50 > xmaxI ? xmaxI : maxBinI + 50;
00339 
00340    ((TH1F*) o["hIntgrl"])->SetAxisRange(xminI, xmaxI);
00341 
00342    //Info("PostFillPassOne", "xminA, xmaxA, xminI, xmaxI: %f, %f, %f, %f", xminA, xmaxA, xminI, xmaxI);
00343 
00344    string sChId("  ");
00345 
00346    for (int i = 1; i <= NSTRIP; i++)
00347    {
00348       sprintf(&sChId[0], "%02d", i);
00349 
00350       maxBinA = ((TH1F*) d["channel" + sChId]->o["hAmpltd_ch" + sChId])->GetMaximumBin();
00351       maxBinI = ((TH1F*) d["channel" + sChId]->o["hIntgrl_ch" + sChId])->GetMaximumBin();
00352 
00353       valueA = ((TH1F*) d["channel" + sChId]->o["hAmpltd_ch" + sChId])->GetBinContent(maxBinA);
00354 
00355       for (int j = 0; j <= 255; j++) {
00356          tmaxBinA = ((TH1F*) d["channel" + sChId]->o["hAmpltd_ch" + sChId])->GetBinContent(j);
00357          if (tmaxBinA >= (valueA * .95)) maxBinAa = j;
00358       }
00359 
00360       maxBinA = maxBinAa;
00361 
00362       // if (i == 9 || i == 10) {
00363       //     for (int j = 0; j <= 255; j++) 
00364       //      tmaxBinI = ((TH1F*) d["channel" + sChId]->o["hIntgrl_ch" + sChId])->GetBinContent(j);
00365       //    if (tmaxBinI >= maxBinI) maxBinI = tmaxBinI;
00366       // }
00367 
00368       //xmin   = ((TH1F*) d["channel"+sChId].o["hAmpltd_ch"+sChId])->GetXaxis()->GetXmin();
00369       //xmax   = ((TH1F*) d["channel"+sChId].o["hAmpltd_ch"+sChId])->GetXaxis()->GetXmax();
00370       //xmin   = maxBin - 50 < xmin ? xmin : maxBin - 50;
00371       //xmax   = maxBin + 50 > xmax  ? xmax : maxBin + 50;
00372 
00373       //xminA = maxBinA - 50;
00374       //xmaxA = maxBinA + 50;
00375       //xminI = maxBinI - 50;
00376       //xmaxI = maxBinI + 50;
00377 
00378       //((TH1F*) d["channel" + sChId]->o["hAmpltd_ch" + sChId])->SetAxisRange(xminA, xmaxA);
00379       //((TH1F*) d["channel" + sChId]->o["hIntgrl_ch" + sChId])->SetAxisRange(xminI, xmaxI);
00380    }
00381 
00382    // Update axis range
00383    utils::UpdateLimits((TH1*) o["hAmGain"]);
00384    utils::UpdateLimits((TH1*) o["hAmGainWidth"]);
00385    utils::UpdateLimits((TH1*) o["hAmIntGain"]);
00386    utils::UpdateLimits((TH1*) o["hAmIntGainWidth"]);
00387    utils::UpdateLimits((TH1*) o["hGdGain"]);
